<noinclude>
This is the "Member" form.
To create a page with this form, enter the page name below;
if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page.

{{#forminput:form=Member|autocomplete on category=Member}}

</noinclude><includeonly>
<div id="wikiPreview" style="display: none; padding-bottom: 25px; margin-bottom: 25px; border-bottom: 1px solid #AAAAAA;"></div>
{{{for template|Member}}}
{| class="formtable"
! Full Name: 
| {{{field|Full Name|input type=text}}}
|-
! Email: <br><p class="pfFieldDescription" style="font-size:0.7em; color:gray;">username :)</p>
| {{{field|Email|input type=text}}}
|-
! Homepage: 
| {{{field|Homepage|input type=text}}}
|-
! Projects: 
| {{{field|Projects|input type=tokens|values from category=Project}}}
|-
! UID: 
| {{{field|UID|input type=text}}}
|-
! ORCID: 
| {{{field|ORCID|input type=text}}}
|-
! eRA Commons ID: <br><p class="pfFieldDescription" style="font-size:0.7em; color:gray;">Username used to log in, not the numeric "Person ID" in your profile</p>
| {{{field|eRA|input type=text}}}
|-
! Twitter: <br><p class="pfFieldDescription" style="font-size:0.7em; color:gray;">(without the @)</p>
| {{{field|Twitter|input type=text}}}
|-
! Fediverse: <br><p class="pfFieldDescription" style="font-size:0.7em; color:gray;">Full URL to profile(s), comma separated</p>
| {{{field|Fediverse|input type=tokens}}}
|-
! Github: <br><p class="pfFieldDescription" style="font-size:0.7em; color:gray;">username :)</p>
| {{{field|Github|input type=text}}}
|-
! Lab Keys: <br><p class="pfFieldDescription" style="font-size:0.7em; color:gray;">Select the keys for lab rooms</p>
| {{{field|LabKeys|input type=checkboxes|values from query={{#ask: [[Category:Lab Room]]}}}}}
|}
{{{end template}}}
